template_input_params.name: vm_1_name
template_input_params.description: Name of VM at OS level
template_input_params.label: VM Hostname

template_input_params.name: vm_1-image
template_input_params.description: Operating system image id / template that should be used when creating the virtual image
template_input_params.label: Operating System ID / Template - vm_1

template_input_params.name: vm_1_memory
template_input_params.description: Memory assigned to the virtual machine in megabytes. This value is required to be an increment of 1024
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Memory (in GB)

template_input_params.name: vm_1_number_of_vcpu
template_input_params.description: Number of virtual CPU for the virtual machine, which is required to be a positive Integer
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine vCPUs - vm_1
